name: Fit The Cat - Lose Some Weight Fat Kitty
name_original: Fit The Cat - Lose Some Weight Fat Kitty
description:
Fit the Cat
”Attractive Graphics.”
“Tough but fun!”
”Challenging and Addictive levels.”
___________________________________

Fit the Cat is a highly addictive game that helps your cat lose weight by jumping the rope. This game is ideal for the people who love an addictive but challenging game - similar to The Line or Flappy Bird. Although, the rules are pretty easy to understand, getting the cat to his ideal weight is really no easy task.

Fit the Cat is a simple game that aims to get the user captivated. Tap the screen to jump the rope. The controls are very easy and simple for all the ages to understand. The more you do the faster your cat will lose weight and the faster the rope will go!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Challenging Levels
So addictive!
Nice graphics
Tough but fun!
